direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle the joining of query parameters with similar control flows and parameter handling.
Both methods join elements from a collection into a string, but with different types of collections (Map vs. ArrayList).
Both methods append elements from a collection to a StringBuilder with similar control flows and parameter handling.
The joinQueryParameters method depends on urlEncode for encoding parameter values, indicating a strong dependency.
The buildFullUrl method uses joinQueryParameters to construct the full URL, indicating a strong dependency.
The buildStreamUrl method uses joinStreamUrls, which has a similar structure to joinQueryParameters, indicating a dependency.
